mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE_T ( SCHE_NO, SCHE_ID, FRN_NO, SCHE_DIV, SCHE_TITLE, SCHE_CONTENT, SCHE_START_TIME, SCHE_END_TIME, CREATE_DT, CREATOR, MODIFY_DT, MODIFIER, SCHE_STAT, EMP_NO ) VALUES ( SCHEDULE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{scheId}, #{frnNo}, #{scheDiv}, #{scheTitle}, #{scheContent}, #{scheStartTime}, #{scheEndTime}, CURRENT_DATE, #{creator}, CURRENT_DATE, #{modifier}, #{scheStat}, #{empNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE_T SET SCHE_DIV = #{scheDiv}, SCHE_TITLE = #{scheTitle}, SCHE_CONTENT = #{scheContent}, SCHE_START_TIME = #{scheStartTime}, SCHE_END_TIME = #{scheEndTime}, MODIFY_DT = CURRENT_DATE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND SCHE_ID = #{scheId}
UPDATE SCHEDULE_T SET SCHE_STAT = #{scheStat}, MODIFY_DT = CURRENT_DATE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND SCHE_ID = #{scheId}
